component.name: Snickerstream
component.summary: Nintendo 3DS streaming client for NTR CFW and HzMod

description.p: Snickerstream is a feature-rich streaming client for Nintendo 3DS consoles. It supports both NTR CFW and HzMod streaming protocols, allowing you to stream your 3DS screens to your computer with high quality and low latency.

ul.li: Support for both NTR CFW and HzMod streaming
Real-time screen scaling and multiple interpolation modes
Various screen layouts including fullscreen and separate windows
Low resource usage and high performance

description.p: Latest stable release with HzMod support and performance improvements.
